field.name: summary
field.value: add AssemblyRelativeResourceLoader for loading resources using with relative template names

field.name: description
field.value:
When FileResourceLoader is used, one only needs to use the relative location of the template. However, when one uses AssemblyResourceLoader, one needs to use the fully qualified name (eg. SomeAssembly.SomeDirectory.Template.vm). This loader allows a prefix to be set during the engine creation, which is automatically prefixed to the template name requested.
I came across the need for it as I used FileResourceLoader in development mode (so that changes would be automatically picked up) but use AssemblyResourceLoader in release mode. So I wanted something that would preserve the semantics of FileResourceLoader without having to request the template using the full name.
